name: Escaping the Dark
description: As the night creeps on, the sole survivor must navigate through the haunting maze in order to reach the light. There are dark spirits lurking in the shadows, preventing the survivor to escape. The noise will confuses the survivor, and the fog will limit the vision. "Escaping Through the Dark" is presented as maze-map, where the the survivor's icon is shown. Also, it is also a love letter to the old horror cinema.
